attributes.action: make ordering goods when you know you have not got the money to pay for it a criminal offence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When requesting goods or services knowing that you do not have the means to pay for them a criminal not a civil offence. A customer of mine defrauded me of £1500 of goods then when the bill is presented informs you that they do not have the money to pay you. This causes a lot of problems to the small businessman sole trader
